reviews.review_msg: Not a good experience with his online class. The TA did all the marking, and John didn't even show up for any of the exams. I understand large classes are busy, especially a W class, but I was discouraged by the lack of participation by the prof. The TA had unclear expectations. I wouldn't take a class with him again if this is how he conducts them

John is a very fair, well-meaning, and passionate guy. Lots of films in this class, probably wishes we would participate more & he deserves that tbh. Lectures are basically like extended tutorials- you have to teach yourself the lecture every week with 60pages from his self-written learning module (free!) & extra readings. Better keep up.
